message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $15000. This price reflects its high quality and potential for growth. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $12000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your acceptable range.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $13500, but I can't go lower than that. This product is truly exceptional, and I believe it's worth the investment. Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your consideration.
